Talk_0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Sorry it's out gettin' rained on. Better
pick it up quick!
Talk_9003:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think>By the way, that's the collection area
where the disassembled parts go.
Watch your step in there.
If you wanna disassemble something,
please talk to me up front instead
of there.
Talk_0001:
<sp:5:0:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Break it down! <sp:5:1:0>Son and done!<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Sir, have you ever regretted attaching
somethin' to your weapon or shield?

<sp:3:0:2:0800>That's the time to tap me, Pelison, here at
the <clr:0000>Break-a-Part Shop<clr:ffff>!

Faster'n you can blink, ZIP-ZAH, <clr:0000>it'll be
back to how it was before<clr:ffff>!
Talk_0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'll take anything<sp:5:0:0>, break it down,<sp:5:0:0> ZIP-ZAH!
Son and done!
Talk_9004:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think>That's the collection area where the
disassembled parts go. Watch your
step in there.
If you wanna disassemble something,
please talk to me up front instead
of there.
Talk_9005:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think>I'm tellin' ya, if you want to disassemble
something, please talk to me up front
instead of there.
Talk_0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Pelison's <clr:0000>Break-a-Part Shop <clr:ffff>is always
open for business—son and done!

I disassemble weapons and shields with
stuff attached to them and <clr:0000>restore them
to their original state<clr:ffff>!
Talk_9006:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Zip-zoop-zah! I can disassemble stuff
<sp:5:0:0>any ol' time. Son and done!
Talk_0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Pelison's <clr:0000>Break-a-Part Shop <clr:ffff>is always
open for business at night—son and done!

I disassemble weapons and shields with
stuff attached to them and <clr:0000>restore them
to their original state<clr:ffff>!
Talk_0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Nothing left you need me to disassemble?
Really, truly nothing?
Talk_9007:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Leave the disassembling to the mighty
Pelison! Come back anytime.
Talk_0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Pelison's <clr:0000>Break-a-Part Shop <clr:ffff>is open for
business no matter the weather—son
and done!
I disassemble weapons and shields with
stuff attached to them and <clr:0000>restore them
to their original state<clr:ffff>!
Talk_0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You want me to break this down?


Just so ya know, my whole thing is
breakin' stuff down. I don't put things
back together. OK?
Talk_0007: <sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>I'll handle it! Time to get crackin'!
Talk_0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Humming>I'll start<sp:5:0:0> before ya can say son, and
break it down, <sp:5:0:0>ZIP-ZAH! ♪'Fore<sp:5:0:0> ya
say son,<sp:5:0:0> ba-DUM-bum <sp:5:0:0>ZIP-<sp:5:0:0>ZAH!<sp:5:0:0>♪
Talk_0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Ta-daaa! I broke it down,<sp:5:0:0> no prob!
It's in the <clr:0000>collection area<clr:ffff>, so don't
forget to go grab it.
Talk_0005_b:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I can disassemble anythin' with
an attachment.
Talk_0005_c:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I can't break somethin' down when
nothin's attached!
Talk_0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Pelison's <clr:0000>Break-a-Part Shop <clr:ffff>is open
for business early in the morn'—son
and done!
I disassemble weapons and shields with
stuff attached to them and <clr:0000>restore them
to their original state<clr:ffff>!
Talk_0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It just costs <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff>! You wanna break
somethin' down?
Talk_0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>Huh? You don't have the money!<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0901>This is my livelihood, man. I won't break it
down if ya don't pay me.
Talk_0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>Hee! You curious how I do it?


I figured out how to break things apart by
disassembling stuff I didn't need anymore
here in my workshop.
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Only I,<sp:5:0:0> the great Pelison, am capable
of this craft!

If you've got somethin' attached to
somethin' else, I can break them apart
and return them to <clr:0000>their original state<clr:ffff>!
Talk_0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:QuestionNormal>Oh, did you forget how it works here?
I'll tell forgetful people as many times
as it takes!
I figured out how to break things apart by
disassembling stuff I didn't need anymore
here in my workshop.
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Only I,<sp:5:0:0> the great Pelison, <clr:0000>am capable
of this craft<clr:ffff>!

If you've got somethin' attached to
somethin' else, I can break them apart
and return them to <clr:0000>their original state<clr:ffff>!
Talk_0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm sorry, but ya gotta clean up the
collection area before I can work.

Until it's clear, I can't disassemble
anything new!

Did you put it there? Did I? Doesn't
matter. It just needs to be gone. Thanks!
Talk_9001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Come back if you ever wanna break it
down with me!
Talk_0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey, with <clr:0000>metallic <clr:ffff>stuff, you should pick
it up super quick before it gets struck
by lightning!
Talk_9002:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>If you ever attach something by mistake,
just leave it to the great Pelison to undo
what ya did.
